summary: An email exchange from July 2023 where an individual (likely a former FBI contact) is informed about threatening text messages received by someone named EM. The original recipient advises contacting 911 or an attorney, indicating the communication is external and not an official FBI report.

events.title: Report of threatening texts
events.description: An individual emails a former FBI contact to report that EM has received threatening text messages, with screenshots taken.

keyFacts: The communication is an external email from July 2023, not an official FBI document.
It reports threatening text messages sent to an individual named EM, with screenshots available.
The recipient, likely a former FBI employee, directs the sender to contact 911 or an attorney, indicating it is not being handled as an active FBI matter through this channel.
